channel.title: Ios on Alex Bachuk
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Alex Bachuk

item.title: WordPress and Phonegap (part3)
item.description: In part 1 and 2 we learned how to prepare everything for our mobile app: get data from WordPress in JSON format and setup jQuery mobile and Phonegap boilerplate. Now, it’s time to get the mobile app actually do something, in this case I will build app fro my blog and portfolio to demonstrate how to work with different post types. I will build iOS app, but the same technique applies to Android, Windows phone, Blackberry, etc.
